0.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A grassy meadow opens up to the west and north.  A large red farm house sits
on the top of a short hill in the distance to the north.  A pair of ducks swim
peacefully on a lake to the west of the meadow.  The meadow is full of animals
grazing and resting on the soft green grass.  A red barn with a white wooden X
built into the door lies to the west of the house.  A blooming and proserpous
field of crops grows to the east of the house.  A plush, green forest completely
surrounds the farm and continues to the south.

1.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A grassy meadow opens up to the west, north and east.  A white and brown
speckled cow lazily walks past you, heading towards a small lake to the
northwest.  A large, red farm house sits on the top of a short hill in the
distance to the north.  The doors of the barn to the west of the farm house
suddenly open and slam shut.  What is going on in there?  The forest to the
south is much too dense to travel any further in that direction.

2.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A grassy meadow opens up to the west and north.  A large red farm house sits
on the top of a short hill in the distance to the north.  A pair of ducks swim
peacefully on a lake to the west of the meadow.  The meadow is full of animals
grazing and resting on the soft green grass.  A red barn with a white wooden X
built into the door lies to the west of the house.  A blooming and proserpous
field of crops grows to the east of the house.  A plush, green forest completely
surrounds the farm and can be accessed a little ways to the south..

3.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A grassy meadow opens up to the north and east.  Farm animals are grazing and
resting all through the field.  A couple of ducks are swimming on a small lake
to the west of the field.  The forest surrounding the farm is much too dense to
continue any further to the west and south.  A large, red farm house sits on top
of a short hill in the distance to the northeast.  The screen door on the porch
of the house suddenly swings open and then slams shut.  What is going on here?

4.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A couple of pigs wallow in a small mud puddle in the middle of the meadow.
They seem to be enjoying themselves, sunning and relaxing without a care in
the world.  Little white and yellow flowers grow all over the meadow.  Their
smell is quite lovely.  A large, red farm house sits on the top of a short
hill to the north.  A small, red barn house lies to the west of the house and
small lake lies in the meadow to the west.  A modest but flourishing crop field
is growing to the east of the house.  You suddenly feel like someone is watching
you.  Looking around, you notice a small flash of red disappear behind a pig.
Running over to take a look, there is nothing to see behind the pig but more
mud and now your boots are muddy.

5.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A peaceful lake lies at the end of the meadow to the west.  A grassy meadow
opens up to the north, east and south.  A large, red farm house sits on top of
a short hill in the distance to the northeast.  A small, red barn house lies to
the west of the house.  Some farm animals lazily graze and sleep all over the
meadow.  They are not worried that you are intruding on their land in the least.
The animals do not even move as you walk right by them.  How strange.

6.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   The grassy and flower filled meadow opens up in every direction.  There are
healthy and happy looking farm animals grazing and resting all through the
meadow.  A large, red farm house sits on the top of a short hill to the
northeast.  A small, red barn lies to the west of the house, north of the
peaceful lake to the west of the meadow.  A metal pail bursts through one of
the barn windows, splashing white milk all over the ground.  What a waste of
milk.

7.name: On a Peaceful Lake
desc: "   The quiet and peaceful lake continues to the west.  The grassy and flower
filled meadow opens up to the north and east.  The forest surrounding the farm
is much too dense to travel and further to the south.  A couple of yellow ducks
swim happily across the top of the lake.  You can see some cows, pigs and horses
graze and rest all through the meadow.  A large, red farm house sits on top of
a short hill to the northeast.  A small, red barn lies to the west of the farm
house, north of the lake.

8.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A large, red farm house sits on the top of a short hill to the north.  A
modest but prospering crop field grows to the east of the house.  A small, red
barn lies to the west of the house, north of the peaceful lake to the west of
the meadow.  The grassy and flower filled meadow opens up to the north, west
and south.  There are healthy looking farm animals grazing and sleeping all
over the meadow.

9.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   A peaceful lake lies at the end of the meadow to the west and south.  A grassy
meadow opens up to the north and east.  A large, red farm house sits on top of
a short hill in the distance to the northeast.  A small, red barn, with a white
wooden X across the barn doors, lies to the west of the house.  A beautiful
brown horse walks up to the lake and begins to lap up the water.  He does not
seem startled by you in the least.  A flash of green runs past the horses legs
and disappears. Rushing to check out the blur, you trip and fall over your own
feet.  Someone has tied your shoelaces together.

10.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   The grassy and flower filled meadow opens up to the west and south.  A short,
grassy hill slowly rises to the east.  A large, red farm house sits on the top
of the hill.  There is a smaller, red barn to the west of the house that must
shelter their live stock.  The healthy barn animals are grazing and sleeping all
over the grassy meadow.  They do not seem to have a care in the world or seem
startled that you are walking among them.  A couple of ducks swim on the top
of a peaceful looking lake to the southwest of the meadow.

11.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "   The grassy and flower filled meadow opens up to the west, south and east.  A
large, red farm house sits on top of a short hill to the northeast.  A smaller,
red barn lies to the west of the house.  There is a large, white wooden X built
into the barn doors.  A peaceful looking lake rests at the end of the meadow to
the southwest.  Healthy looking farm animals graze and rest lazily all around
the meadow.

12.name: On a Peaceful Lake
desc: "   The quiet and peaceful lake continues to the west and south.  A grassy and
flower filled meadow opens up to the north and east.  There are several barn
animals grazing and sleeping all through the meadow.  A small, red barn lies
a little north of the meadow, to the west of the large, red barn house sitting
on a short hill to the northeast.  A couple of yellow ducks swims happily across
the top of the lake, squaking and fishing for their next meal.

13.name: A Grass Covered Hill
desc: "   The flower covered hill is quite lovely.  You can see out over the entire
grassy meadow.  Some farm animals lazily graze and rest all over the bright
green grass.  A peaceful lake lies at the end of the meadow to the southwest.
A large, red house sits on the top of the hill a little further to the
northeast.  A screened in wooden porch has been built into the front of the
house.  A piercing scream bellows from the screen door to the porch and the
door to the house suddenly slams shut.  It looks like someone is rocking on
a chair inside the porch, maybe the scream came from them?

14.name: In a Grassy Meadow
desc: "  A large pair of barn doors open the way to the red barn to the north.  There
is a large, white wooden X built into the barn doors.  "Get out of here!",
comes a shout from within the barn.  *CRASHSMASH*  You hear a yell of frustration
coming from within the barn.  "Can't you things let me work in peace?!", a man
shouts.  *CRASH*  What is going on in there?  The grassy and flower filled meadow
opens up to the east.  A couple of yellow ducks wade in a peaceful lake to the
south.  A plush, green forest completely surrounds the farm at the end of the
meadow and lake.

15.name: On a Peaceful Lake
desc: "   The quiet and peaceful lake continues to the west, north and east.  The
forest surrounding the farm is much too dense to travel any further to the
south.  A couple of yellow ducks swim happily across the top of the lake.
They squak and wiggle their cute little tails as they wade in the water.
A grassy and flower filled meadow meets the lake a little ways to the east.
A large, red farm house sits on top of a short hill to the far northeast. A
large, white wooden X marks the doors of a small, red barn to the west of
the farm house.  Some farm animals walk and graze lazily all through the
the meadow.

16.name: On a Peaceful Lake
desc: "   The quiet and peaceful lake continues to the east and south.  The forest
surrounding the farm is much too dense to continue any further to the north
and west.  A couple of yellow ducks swim happily across the top of the lake.
They squak and dip their heads into the lake, catching their next meal.  How
cute.  A grassy and flower filled meadow meets the lake a little ways to the
east.  A large, red farm house sits on top of a short hill to the far north
east.  A small, red barn lies to the west of the house.  There is a large,
white wooden X across the barn doors.

17.name: On a Peaceful Lake
desc: "   The quiet and peaceful lake continues to the north and east.  The forest
surrounding the farm is much too dense to continue any further to the south
and west.  A couple of yellow ducks swim happily across the top of the lake.
They squak and dip their heads into the lake, catching their next meal.  How
cute.  A grassy and flower filled meadow meets the lake a little ways to the
east.  A large, red farm house sits on top of a short hill to the far north
east.  A small, red barn lies to the west of the house.  There is a large,
white wooden X across the barn doors.

18.name: A Grass Covered Hill
desc: "   The view from the hill top allows you to see the entire farm.  There is a
prospering crop field growing at the end of a small trail to the east.  The
grassy and flower filled meadow opens up the the southwest, bordering to a
peaceful lake at the meadow's edge.  A plush, green forest completely surrounds
the farm.  The large, red farm house to the north is enourmous.  There is a
quaint wooden porch that has built into the house.  The porch has been covered
in some kind of mesh netting that keeps out the pests.  There is an elderly
female rocking in a chair on the porch, but she was definitely not the one who
was screaming.  In fact, she appears to be taking a cat nap.

19.name: On a Wooden Porch
desc: "   A white door leads into the red farm house to the north of the porch.  The
floor boards of the porch continue to the west.  Two white, wooden rocking
chairs and a simple wooden table rest on the other end of the porch.  A mesh
screen encloses the porch, protecting the residents of the farm house from
bugs and such.  The screen door to the south leads to the grass covered hill
above the meadow.

20.name: On a Wooden Porch
desc: "  An old woman in a blue dress sleeps peacefully in a rocking chair to the left
of a wooden table at the end of the porch.  The chair gently rocks back and
forth in rhythm with the granny's deep breaths.  A large pitcher of iced tea
perspires onto the red and white checkered table cloth.  The ice in a glass
half-full of iced tea shifts as it begins to melt.  Looking out through the
mesh netting surrounding the porch you can see the entire grassy meadow.  The
farm's animals walk and graze all throughout the field.  A small, red barn lies
next to the farm house to the west.

21.name: Entrance to the Farm House
desc: "   A burning oil lamp rests on a simple wooden table resting against the wall
to the west of the door.  A steep wooden staircase built into the eastern wall
rises into the ceiling to the second floor.  An army of chairs surrounds a
large table in the room to the west.  There seems to be some commotion coming
from the back of the house to the north.  A white door to the south leads out
of the house and onto the barn porch.  A screaming woman runs across the doorway
to the north.  It looks like her cloths are on fire!  A white plate suddenly
flies across the room to the west and breaks on the large wooden table,
shattering into pieces.  What is going on here?

22.name: In the Family Room
desc: "  A roaring fire burns in the fire place built into the eastern wall.  The flames
seem to be larger than normal and are breathing out into the air.  A young woman
runs around the room like a chicken with its head cut off.  Her red blouse seems
to have caught on fire.  A couple of people are trying to put her out with a
large quilted blanket.  A small laugh echoes into your right ear.  Looking in
that direction, all you can see is the hallway to the front door of the house.
A large banquet of food sits on a table in the kitchen to the south.
"  A large golden turkey slowly rises from the table, standing on its two little
drumsticks.  It starts to do a little dance across the table, kicking the side
dishes onto the floor.

23.name: In the Dining Room
desc: "   It is obvious someone is getting ready for a feast.  The large table is set
with ten chairs and ten place settings.  The farm keeper's family must be huge!
The shattered pieces of a white plate are scattered across the table.  It was
definitely flung into the room from the north.  It looks like a kitchen lies
to the north.  You can see a long counter top spanning the room from here.
Another dish flies through the air from the north and smashes into your face.
A small laugh echoes into your ear from your right shoulder, but looking
quickly all you can see is the stair case leading up to the second floor.
"  The kitchen is swirling with a hurricane of white dishes.  They crash and
break onto the floor.

24.name: In the Kitchen
desc: "   A thick wooden table covered in cooked and baked delights sits in the middle
of the room.  The northern and western walls have glass windows looking out into
the back of the house.  A long wooden counter runs under the windows along the
walls.  A gray haired woman stands under the window to the north, washing some
dishes in the sink.  She does not seem affected by the chaos surrounding her in
the least.  The dining room lies to the south and the family room lies to the
east.
"  *CRASH*  It feels like one of the white kitchen dishes has smashed into your
head.
"   *WOOSH*  A bright burning flame explodes like a fireball from the fireplace,
almost burning off your eyebrows.

25.name: The Upstairs Hallway
desc: "   The upstairs hallway continues to the north and west.  A wooden stair case
built into the wall the the east leads down the the floor below.  The hallways
are strangely vacant and eerily quiet.  Lit glowing lamps sit on tables along
the hallways to the north and west.

26.name: Down the North Hallway
desc: "   A dim glow shines from the bronze glowing lamp resting upon the thin wooden
table against the western wall.  The banister to the stair way leading down to
the main floor of the house can be seen at the end of the hallway to the south.
Double wooden doors lead to a room to the east.  One of the doors is slightly
opened so that you can peek inside.  There seems to be quite a lot of activity
inside.  Pretty blue curtains drape across a window at the end of the hallway
to the north.  Pulling back the curtains you can see out over the chicken coop
and into the plush, green forest surrounding the farm.

27.name: Down the West Hallway
desc: "   A dim glow shines from the bronze glowing lamp resting upon the thin wooden
table against the northern wall.  The banister to the stair way leading down
to the main floor of the house can be seen at the end of the hallway to the
east.  Wooden doors lie to the north and south.  They must lead to the bed
rooms of the house's residents.  Pretty blue curtains drape across a window
at the end of the hallway to the west.  Pulling back the curtains you can
see out over the barn and into the plush, green trees surrounding the farm.

28.name: The Master Bedroom
desc: "   A large bed juts out into the middle of the room from the eastern wall.  An
oil painting of a beautiful bouquet of flowers hangs above the bed.  There are
two windows in the east wall, one on each side of the bed, looking out over the
small but respectable crop field to the east of the farm house.  Some oak and
pine dressers stand against the northern wall.  There are two large doors leading
back into the hallway to the west.  Two small children are jumping and playing
on top the bed.  Didn't their mothers tell them not to jump on the bed?  They
are causing a tremendous racket and seem to be having the time of the lives.

29.name: A Cozy Bedroom
desc: "   The bedroom looks as though no one has used it in a very long time.
Everything is perfectly preserved as though someone was making a memorial to
the past.  The old farmer and his wife must not have wanted to change the
style of the room, even though it is obvious their children have been gone
for a long time.  There are bunk beds against the east and west walls.  The
beds are covered in colorful hand made quilts that are tucked in and clean.
Some of the children's old toys are sitting on wooden shelves that are
standing against the southern wall.  A window built into the north wall
looks out over the chicken coop and into the forest surrounding the farm
house.

30.name: A Cozy Bedroom
desc: "   This bedroom is a total disaster.  Furniture and clothes fly around the room
as if they have minds of their own.  Flashes of green and blue run all around
the floating debris.  A man and a woman are huddled in the southwest corner of
the room.  The man stands in front of the woman with his arms outstretched,
blocking any of the dangerous flying objects from striking her.  Unfortunately,
the poor man is being pummeled by a barrage of debris strikes.  It looks quite
painful.

31.name: A Path Around the House
desc: "   The grassy path is worn from frequent travel.  Patches of mud are shining
through the bright and vibrant green grass.  The path along the hill continues
to the east and northwest.  It seems to lead behind the large, red farm house
setting on the top of the hill.  What could be back there?

32.name: A Path Around the House
desc: "   The grassy path is worn from frequent travel.  Patches of mud are shining
through the bright and vibrant green grass.  The path along the hill continues
to the north and southeast.  It seems to lead behind the large, red farm house
setting on the top of the hill.  What could be back there?

33.name: A Path Around the House
desc: "   The path around the house is almost all dirt in this area.  You are in
between the house and the barn, so the sunlight and water must not reach this
area as frequently.  The path continues north to the backyard and south into
the grassy and flower filled meadow.  It looks like a chicken coup has been
built behind the house.  Some chickens peck at the ground in front of the coup.

34.name: A Path Around the House
desc: "   The backyard of the house is a fenced in free range area for their chickens.
Some chickens walk around, pecking at the ground for some corn feed.  The forest
surrounding the farm lies at the edge of the range.  There are some large, steel
doors at the end of the path to the east, leading into the ground.  There must
be a basement under the house.

35.name: In the Backyard
desc: "   The backyard of the house is a fenced in free range area for the chickens.
Some of the chickens walk around, pecking at the ground for some corn feed.  The
forest surrounding the farm lies at the edge of the range to the north.  A pink
vase crashes through a window directly above you.  A couple of glass shards stick
into your armor.  "Help!", comes a scream from the house.  "Help!!!!!!", the
voice resonates as a chubby woman suddenly starts flailing her arms out the
window, trying to escape.  She looks at you with an intense fear in her eyes and
is suddenly dragged back into the house.  There are some large, steel doors at
the end of the path to the east.  They must lead to a basement underneath the
house.

36.name: In the Backyard
desc: "   The backyard of the house if a fenced in free range area for the chickens.
Some of the chickens walk around, pecking at the ground for some corn fee.  The
forest surrounding the farm lies at the edge of the range to the north.  A large
pair of steel doors are built at an angle into the house and ground.  The doors
must lead to a basement beneath the house.  The path around the house continues
to the west.

37.name: In the Basement
desc: "   The large steel doors closed with a slam as you walk down the stairs into the
basement.  There are wooden shelves on built on every wall, containing various
canned and preserved fruits and vegetables.  A large slab of cured beef hangs
from a steel hook in the ceiling.  Suddenly, the bottles and cans on the shelves
begin to shake and rattle.  *CRASH*  Some berry preserves fly off the the shelf
and breaks over your face.  Flashes of red and blue begin to appear all over the
basement.  A tiny laugh rings into your right ear as a can of vegetables slams
into your head.

38.name: A Path to the Field
desc: "   A simple stone path leads up and down the hill.  There is a modest but
flourishing crop field beyond and wooden fence to the east.  The farmers are
growing all types of fruits and vegetables.  They all look ripe and ready to
be picked and eaten.  A large, red farm house sits atop the grassy hill to
the west.  A plush, green forest surrounds the farm.  Flashes of green and
yellow can be seen running through the crop field.  What is going on here?

39.name: On a Healthy Crop Field
desc: "   The wooden fence protecting the crop field runs to the west and south.  A
bright and flourishing field of vegetables grows to the north and east.  Several
rows grow in lines from the west side of the fence and clear across the field
to the east fence.  You can see some green corn husks, bright red tomato vines,
huge bulbs of cauliflower and broccoli and a large patch of mushrooms.  The
mushrooms seem to be covering most of the northeast section of the field and
are even growing into the fence.

40.name: On a Healthy Crop Field
desc: "   The wooden fence protecting the crop field runs to the north and west.  A
bright and flourishing field of vegetables grows to the east and south.  The
rows of vegetables stops about half way across the field.  The entire north
eastern quadrant of the field is covered in a gigantic mushroom patch.  The
mushrooms range in varying sizes and are even covering most of the fence to
the far east of the field.

41.name: On a Healthy Crop Field
desc: "   The wooden fence protecting the crop field runs to the east and south.  A
bright and flourishing field of vegetables grows to the north and west.  Several
rows grow in lines from the west side of the fence and clear across the field
to the east fence.  You can see some green corn husks, bright red tomato vines,
huge bulbs of cauliflower and broccoli and a large patch of mushrooms.  The
mushrooms seem to be covering most of the northeast section of the field and
are even growing into the fence.

42.name: On a Healthy Crop Field
desc: "   This entire part of the crop field is covered in mushrooms of various sizes.
The tops of the mushrooms range from the size of a gold coin all the way up to
the size of a clay dinner plate.  Mushrooms are even covering the entire
eastern fence.  It looks almost as though there is a hole in the middle of the
mushroom fence that you could climb through.  The bright and flourishing field
of vegetables grows to the west and south.
"  You suddenly start to feel strange.  The sensation of falling hits your
stomach almost making your wretch.  The mushroom stems are getting longer
and you seem to be moving closer to the ground.  As the mushroom tops start
to block out the sun above you quickly come to the decision that you have
been shrunk.

43.name: Inside the Red Barn
desc: "   The barn is in complete chaos.  Hay is raining down from the wooden rafters
of the barn like a snow storm.  *Moo*  A white and black patched cow flies in
front of you from the west, heading to the northern end of the barn.  *CRASH*
The sound of a bottle breaking comes from the east.  You can see the farmers
large garden hoe being slowly dismantled without anyone touching it.  All you
can see are blurs of red and blue.  Indecipherable shouting is coming from the
back of the barn.  A steel container of milk is thrown into the center of the
barn, spilling milk everywhere.

44.name: Inside the Red Barn
desc: "   Hay is raining down from the wooden rafters of the barn like a snow storm.
A steel container rolls around in a fresh puddle of milk on the dirt and hay
covered floor of the barn.  An unfortunate white and black patched cow is
slowly rotating in mid-air in a clockwise direction.  It does not seem
very distressed and actually appears to be enjoying the ride.  A flash of green
zips past the cow's head.  "Get out of here!", echoes in from the east.  *CRASH*
The sound of another bottle breaking comes from the east.  What is going on in
there?

45.name: A Workbench in the Barn
desc: "   A work desk has been built into the eastern and southern walls.  Shelves full
of tools, bottles and cans are built into the walls above the shelves.  The
remnants of the farmer's garden hoe lie in pieces on the dirt floor.  Someone
has carefully disassembled the large tool and scattered it around the ground.
Suddenly, flashes of red and green zip around the room at amazing speeds.  The
pieces of the hoe begin to levitate above the ground and in no time at all the
machine looks as though it is ready to plow the fields.

46.name: A Hay Covered Stable
desc: "   The floor of the stable is covered in a thin layer of golden hay.  The
southern wall is covered in leather straps and harnesses.  A long, metal trough
full of animal feed runs along the western wall.  Some shouting can be heard
coming from the middle of the barn to the south.

47.name: A Hay Covered Stable
desc: "   The floor of the stable is covered in a thin layer of golden hay.  It is
clear that some of the farm animals sleep in here at times.  The northern
wall is covered with leather straps and saddles.  A long trough full of animal
feed runs along the western wall.  Complete chaos is occurring in the middle
of the barn the east.  A poor cow is levitating in the middle barn and spinning
in a circle. *MOOOOOO*  There is magic afoot!

48.name: A Milking Station
desc: "   Wooden shelves full of clear and white milk bottles line the walls of the
milking station.  A brown and white patched cow munches peacefully on a trough
of feed on the eastern wall.  An elderly gentleman dressed in blue overalls and
a checkered red and white shirt sits on a stool south of the cow.  His hands are
reached under the cow, milking the animal into a large steel bucket on the floor.
Some bottles of milk are flying through the air and crashing on the ground.
"I worked all day for this!", the man screams, "Go talk to your king.  He said
we could stay here!".  The old man covers his head with one arm and tries to
keep milking with the other.

49.name: In the Loft
desc: "   The walkway of the loft consists of several long, wooden planks placed
together on the rafters of the barn.  A wooden ladder sticks through a hole
in the walkway leading to the barn below.  The boards of the walkway creak
and wobble with each step that you take.  It feels like they could break at any
moment and cause you to fall to the barn floor below.  Some shouting bellows
through the hole in the walkway, but it is too undecipherable to understand.

50.name: In the Loft
desc: "   The walkway of the loft is several long, wooden planks places together on the
rafters of the barn.  They creak and wobble with each step you take.  It feels
like they could break and cause you to fall to the cold, hard ground of the barn
below.  A stockpile of hay bales has been stored up here for safe keeping.  Some
loud commotion is coming from within the barn below the loft.  The walkway of
the loft continues to the north.

51.name: Inside the Range
desc: "   White and yellow chickens prance and peck their way around the range.  They
eye you carefully, afraid that one of them may be this evening's meal.  There
is a large chicken coop at the end of the range to the west.  The chickens
must lay their eggs and sleep in there.  The range is surrounded by a wire
fence that prevents the chickens from escaping.  It looks like it does a
good job keeping out predators too as the chickens are healthy and plentiful.
A path around the farm house lies to the south of the range.  A plush, green
forest lies at the far end of the coop to the north and east.

52.name: Inside the Range
desc: "   A wire fence encloses the chicken range to the west and north.  The open
range continues to the east and south.  White and yellow chickens cluck and
peck their way around the range.  They eye you carefully, afraid that one of
them may be this evening's meal.  A plush, green forest surrounds the range
to the west, north and far east.  You see some of the chickens walking in and
out of a large chicken coop to the southwest.  A large, red farm house rests
on the top of a short hill behind the range to the south.

53.name: Inside the Range
desc: "   A wire fence encloses the chicken range to the east and north.  The open
range continues to the west and south.  White and yellow chickens cluck and
peck their way around the range.  They eye you carefully, afraid that one of
them may be this evening's meal.  A plush, green forest surrounds the range
to the east, north and far west.  You see some of the chickens walking in and
out of a large chicken coop to the southwest.  A large, red farm house rests
on the top of a short hill behind the range to the south.

54.name: Inside the Range
desc: "   A wire fence encloses the chicken range to the east and south.  The open
range continues to the north and west.  White and yellow chickens peck and
cluck their way around the range.  They eye you carefully, afraid that one of
them may be this evening's meal.  There is a large chicken coop at the end
of the range to the far west.  A plush, green forest surrounds the range to
the east and far north.  A large, red farm house lies to the south.

55.name: Inside the Chicken Coop
desc: "   Straw nests built into wooden planks climb the wall like steps on a flight
of stairs.  There are several chickens in the coop, sleeping and clucking
peacefully.  Someone has obviously not been doing their chores as quite a
few white and brown colored eggs can be seen in the nests.  A feed trough
lies in the middle of the coop.  Corn kennels and grain seeds are scattered
around in the dirt.

56.name: A Field of Mushrooms
desc: "   The mushroom field seems to span out for miles.  The top of the mushroom cap
is huge, but considering the fact that you have been shrunk down to about six
inches, everything looks pretty darn big.  A red pulley cart hangs by a single
steel pole from some thick steel wires running between the mushroom caps above
your head.  There are giant mushroom caps lying to the east and west.  You
could probably get back to the crop field through the same hole that you climbed
through.
"  The ground starts to move further and further away.  The magic that shrunk
you must stop once you leave the mushroom forest.  Thank goodness!
"  Grabbing a hold of the metal cart you are whisked off to the next mushroom
cap.

57.name: A Field of Mushrooms
desc: "   The mushroom field seems to span out for miles.  The top of the mushroom cap
is huge, but considering the fact that you have been shrunk down to about six
inches, everything looks pretty darn big.  There are steel gutters surrounding
a large mushroom cap above your head.  The gutters seem to be gathering and
filtering rain water into several iron buckets hanging along the sides of the
steel railing.  There are giant mushroom caps lying to the north and east.
"  The ground starts to move further and further away.  The magic that shrunk
you must stop once you leave the mushroom forest.  Thank goodness!

86.name: A Field of Mushrooms
desc: "   The mushroom field ends at the base of a thick, healthy looking tree.
Looking back to the south, it appears as though the mushroom field grows on
for miles.  The top of the mushroom cap is huge, but considering the fact that
you have been shrunk down to about six inches, everything looks pretty darn
big.  There are steel gutters surrounding the edges of a large mushroom cap
above your head.  The gutters seem to be gathering and filtering water into
several iron buckets hanging along the sides of the steel railing.  Some
large mushroom caps lie to the west and south.
"  The ground starts to move further and further away.  The magic that shrunk
you must stop once you leave the mushroom forest.  Thank goodness!

87.name: A Field of Mushrooms
desc: "   The mushroom field ends at the base of a thick, healthy looking tree.
Looking back to the south, it appears as though the mushroom field grows on
for miles.  The top of the mushroom cap is huge, but considering the fact that
you have been shrunk down to about six inches, everything looks pretty darn
big.  A red pulley cart hangs by a single steel pole from some thick steel
wires running between some mushroom caps above your head.  The wires are
running to another mushroom to the southeast.  There are giant mushroom
caps lying to the west and east.
"  The ground starts to move further and further away.  The magic that shrunk
you must stop once you leave the mushroom forest.  Thank goodness!
"  Grabbing a hold of the metal cart you are whisked off to the next mushroom
cap.

88.name: A Field of Mushrooms
desc: "   The mushroom field ends at the base of a thick, healthy looking tree.
There is a stone door frame built into the tree here.  The stones are about
three inches long and wide.  They are covered in intricate runes from a
language that you have never seen before.  The door frame glows and pulses
as you run you finger along the top of one of the runes.  The frame is just
begging to be touched.  Looking back to the south, it appears a though the
mushroom field grows on for miles.  The top of the mushroom cap is huge, but
considering the fact that you have been shrunk down to about six inches,
everything looks pretty darn big.  A large mushroom cap lies to the east.
"  The ground starts to move further and further away.  The magic that shrunk
you must stop once you leave the mushroom forest.  Thank goodness!

89.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

90.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Flashing lights can be seen coming from rooms to the northeast and southwest.
The hollowed out tree continues up and down.  Ladder like steps have been carved
into the sides of the tree making it easy to climb.  There are copper wires
running along the walls of the tree.  They seem to be vibrating and are glowing
with a dull, pulsing white light.

91.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Flashing lights can be seen coming from rooms to the north and east.  The
hollowed out tree continues up and down.  Ladder like steps have been carved
into the sides of the tree making it easy to climb.  There are copper wires
running along the walls of the tree.  They seem to be vibrating and are glowing
with a dull, pulsing white light.

92.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have blue flowers growing in them.  The flowers
are a navy blue color and have opaque pink petals growing on them.  A couple of
gnomes are casting spells at a couple of mischievious shadows that have gotten
loose.  There is a wolfman strapped down to a table to the back of the room.
A gnome seems to be studying it and making notes on his clipboard.  The hollowed
out tree lies to the southwest.

93.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have purple flowers growing in them.  There flowers
are a eggplant purple color and have grayish-black petals growing on them.  There
is a small black dragon flying around the room, breathing some fire on a couple
of scared gnomes.  A pair of wererats are running around the room causing some
random havoc.  The hollowed out tree lies to the northeast.

94.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

95.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Flashing lights can be seen coming from rooms to the north and west.  The
hollowed out tree continues up and down.  Ladder like steps have been carved
into the sides of the tree making it easy to climb.  There are copper wires
running along the walls of the tree.  They seem to be vibrating and are glowing
with a dull, pulsing white light.

96.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have pink flowers growing in them.  The flowers
are a bright pink color and have shiny yellow petals growing on them.  A carrion
crawlers sleeps curled up in the middle of the table.  One of the gnomes is
chasing a carrion crawler around the room, trying to get it back into its
cage.  The hollowed out tree lies to the south.

97.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have orange flowers growing in them.  The flowers
are a pumpkin orange color and have dull brown petals growing on them.  A gnome
is trying to feed a small white dragon that is sitting on a wooden pedistol.  The
dragon shoots out little bolts of lightning every time the gnome gets close.  A
tiny minotaur is running around the room, stopping at all the flower pots to
smell the fragrant blooms.  The hollowed out tree lies to the east.

98.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making it easy
to climb down.  The hollowed out tree is huge!  The pathway through the middle
of the tree fades into the darkness below.  There is a doorway cut into the tree
to the east.  The vibrant, bright green forest flourishes unlike the dull, pulsing
white glow coming from the wires lacing the walls of the tree.  The wires seem
to be made of copper and vibrate gently with the slightest touch.

99.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have yellow flowers growing in them.  The flowers
are a pale yellow color and have shiny white petals growing on them.  A white
and black cow is tied to a post to the back of the room.  There is a fire beetle
strapped to a steel table to the right of the cow.  A gnome seems to be studying
the animal very intently, making notes on a clipboard he is holding.  The
hollowed out tree lies to the west.

100.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have white flowers growing in them.  The flowers
are a bright white color and have pale blue petals growing on them.  A couple
of gnomes are feeding some caged troglodytes and gnolls.  The monsters look
at you with very sad looks on their faces.  A sleeping war dog is strapped to
a table towards the back of the room.  A gnome is carefully studying the
animal and making notes on his clipboard.  The hollowed out tree lies to the
south.

101.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Flashes of light spark and pop in various spots along the hollowed out tree
above you.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb up.  The hollowed out tree is huge!  The pathway through the
middle of the tree fades into the darkness above.  There is a doorway cut into
the tree to the north, leading to the vibrant and flourishing forest waiting
outside.  There are thin copper wires laced into the bark of the tree and
across the bottom of the floor.  The wires hum and vibrate gently as you step
on them.  A dull, white light slowly pulses from the wires every few minutes.

102.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

103.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   Flashing lights can be seen coming from rooms to the northwest and southeast.
The hollowed out tree continues up and down.  Ladder like steps have been carved
into the sides of the tree making it easy to climb.  There are copper wires
running along the walls of the tree.  They seem to be vibrating and are glowing
with a dull, pulsing white light.

104.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

105.name: An Experimentation Room
desc: "   A large table rests in the center of the room.  There are some clay flower
pots sitting on the table that have black flowers growing on them.  The flowers
are pitch-black color and have misty-white petals growing on them.  As you
approach the table the flowers seem to shift towards you slightly, as though they
can sense your presence.  A shrunken hill giant sleeps on a table towards the back
of the room.  A gnome carefully studies the giant and makes quick notes on his
clipboard.  He has not seemed to have notice that you are wandering around his
laboratory.

106.name: The Hydroponic Laboratory
desc: "   A gigantic machine covers the walls of the room.  Blinking lights surround
a series of buttons and switches on nearly every inch of the large metal
machines.  There are large glass hoses sticking out of the back of the machine.
The hoses are full of bubbling water that seems to be feeding towards the east
and west.  Where is all that water going?

107.name: A Path Along the Vines
desc: "   The wooden walkway continues to the east and west.  There are green vines
growing to the north.  The vines are growing along some thin wires that form
a sort of wall before you.  The wires run from the walkway to a metal watering
device above your head to the north.  The watering system sprays out mists
of water every few minutes, refreshing the flowers and your face.  Some pale
yellow flowers with shiny white petals grow all along the vines.  Maybe the
gnomes will not notice if you take one!  It appears that you can climb down
the vines from here to reach another walkway.

247.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues to
the southeast.  A beautiful wall of flowers lies to the north.  The gnomes have
carved intricate patterns and designs into the tree.  The carvings seems to
shift and move as you stare at them.  They appear to be telling some sort
of story, possibly the gnomish history, but it is too difficult to understand.

248.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues up
and to the northwest.  A beautiful wall of flowers lies in the distance to the
northwest.  The trees of the forest look like gigantic wooden towers from this
angle.  Looking over the side of the steps, it appears as though a fall from
up here would possibly be a fatal one.  The side of the tree catches your
attention.  The gnomes have carved intricate patterns and designs into the tree.
The carvings seem to shift and move as you stare at them.  They appear to be
telling some sort of story, possibly a tale of gnomish lore.  It is too
difficult to understand.

249.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues down
and to the southeast.  A beautiful wall of flowers lies in the distance to the
northwest.  The trees of the forest look like gigantic wooden towers from this
angle.  Looking over the side of the steps, it appears as though a fall from
up here would possibly be a fatal one.  The side of the tree catches your
attention.  The gnomes have carved intricate patterns and designs into the tree.
The carvings seem to shift and move as you stare at them.  They appear to be
telling some sort of story, possibly a tale of gnomish lore.  It is too
difficult to understand.

250.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues east

251.name: A Path Around the Tree

They appear to be telling some sort of story, possibly a tale of gnomish lore.
It is much too difficult to understand.  The forest of trees surrounding you

260.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues down
and to the east.  You can clearly see the bridge connecting this tree to another
large tree in the distance to the east from here.  A little further up the wooden
stairs and you should reach the bridge.  The forest of trees surrounding you look
like gigantic wooden towers from this angle.  Looking over the side of the steps,
it appears as though a fall from up here would probably be a fatal one.

261.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree continues to
the north and west.  A bridge connecting this tree to another large tree to the
east lies directly to the north.  The bridge appears to be suspended in the air
with the same wires that make up the flower wall.  The forest of tress surrounding
you look like gigantic wooden towers from this angle.  Looking over the side of
the steps, it appears as though a fall from up here would probably be a fatal
one.

262.name: A Path Around the Tree
desc: "   A pathway of wooden steps that has been carved out of the tree descends the
tree to the south.  There is a rune covered door built into the tree to the
west.  There are stone bricks completely surrounding the doorway, also covered
in runes.  The runes glow and seem to pulse as you run your fingers over them.
A swaying wooden bridge extends from the tree to the east.  It appears to go
all the way to another large tree in the distance to the east.  What could be
over there?

extra.desc: "  The bridge sways gently with each step on the wooden boards beneath you.

263.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the west.  A runed covered door built into
the wall to the east must lead to the outside.  Two thin copper wires run along
the length of the ceiling.  The are glowing with a soft white luster that is
providing excellent light to see completely down the hallway.

264.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the east and west.  The hallway ends at a
door a short distance to the east.  There appears to be some sort of machine
room to the west.  Two thin copper wires run the length of the ceiling.  They
are glowing with a soft white luster that is providing excellent light to see
in every direction.

265.name: The Machine Room
desc: "   Large steel machines cover every inch of the walls in this room.  They leave
a perfect circle in the middle of the room.  A steel ladder climbs down from the
ceiling in the exact center of the room.  A multi-colored light show glows
through the ladder hole in the ceiling.  There are hallways leading to the
north, east, south and west.  Two rows of thin copper wires run down from the
hole in the ceiling and continue down each of the hallways.  A soft white
glow emits and pulses from the wires providing excellent light to see in
every direction.

266.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the north and south.  There appears to be
some sort of machine room to the north.  Two thin copper wires run along the
length of the ceiling.  They are glowing with a soft white luster that is
providing excellent light to see in every direction.

267.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the east and west.  There appears to be
some sort of machine room to the north.  Two thin copper wires run along the
length of the ceiling.  They are glowing with a soft white luster that is
providing excellent light to see in every direction.

268.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the north and south.  There appears to be
some sort of machine room to the north.  Two thin copper wires run along the

providing excellent light to see in every direction.

269.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the east.  Bright flashes spark from the
rooms to the north and south.  There seems to be a flurry of movement in both
rooms.  Two thin copper wires run along the length of the ceiling.  They are
glowing with a soft white luster that is providing excellent light to see in
every direction.

270.name: A Small Laboratory
desc: "   Wooden tables line the walls of the laboratory.  Another square wooden table
covers the entire center of the room.  The tables are covered with small whicker
baskets full of the crystal shards.  The gnomes are processing the crystals even
further.  The crystals are starting to look much like the ones in the crystal
room above the giant machine in the center of the tree.  Sparks fly from the
crystals as the gnomes chip and whittle away at them.  A well lit hallway can
be found to the south.

271.name: A Small Laboratory
desc: "   Wooden tables line the walls of the laboratory.  Another square wooden table
covers the entire center of the room.  The tables are covered with small whicker
baskets full of the crystal shards.  The gnomes are processing the crystals even
further.  The crystals are starting to look much like the ones in the crystal

272.name: A Well Lit Hallway
desc: "   The well lit hallway continues to the south.  Bright flashes spark from the
rooms to the west and east.  There seems to be a flurry of movement in both
rooms.  Two thin copper wires run along the length of the ceiling.  They are
glowing with a soft white luster that is providing excellent light to see in
every direction.

273.name: A Small Laboratory
desc: "   Wooden tables line the walls of the laboratory.  Another square wooden table
covers the entire center of the room.  The tables are covered in raw and unrefined
rock and stones.  You can see bits of crystal sticking out of the boulders.  The
gnomes are chipping and banging away at the rocks with hammers and chisels.
Sparks fly from the crystals when the gnomes chip away at them.  They carefully
place the crystals in piles on their work benches when they are done.

278.name: A Gently Swaying Bridge
desc: "   The wooden bridge gently sways as you walk between the trees.  Thin wires
attached to the edges of the bridge and connected to the trees suspend the
structure in mid-air.  The forest surrounding the bridge looks like a giant
city from this angle.  The trees reach into the sky like huge wooden towers.
The wooden bridge continues to the east and west.

extra.desc: "  The bridge sways gently with each step on the wooden boards beneath you.

desc: "  The sturdy wooden steps of the tree are a nice contrast to the swaying wooden
bridge.

A runed covered door is built into the tree to the east.  The wooden bridge

extra.desc: "  The bridge sways gently with each step on the wooden boards beneath you.

285.name: A Hallway Through the Tree
desc: "   A well lit hallway continues to the east.  There is a runed door built into
the tree to the west.  Two thin copper wires run along the length of the ceiling.
They are glowing with a soft white luster that is providing excellent light to
see in every direction.

286.name: A Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The hollowed out tree continues up and down.  There is a pulsing, green glow
coming from the rooms to the north, east and west.  Ladder like steps have been
carved into the sides of the tree making it easy to climb.  You notice that
there are two rows of thin copper wiring running along the left side of the
ladder.  It seems to run the entire length of the tree.  The wires glow with
a soft white light that makes it easy to see in every direction.

287.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

288.name: Inside a Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The tree continues up and down.  There are copper wires running along the
walls of the tree.  They seem to vibrate and are glowing with a dull, pulsing
light.  Ladder like steps have been carved into the sides of the tree making
it easy to climb.

289.name: A Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   The hollowed out tree continues down along some wooden steps built into the
walls.  There are two sets of thin copper wire running along the left side of
the ladder.  They seem to run the entire length of the tree.  The wires glow
with a soft white light that makes it easy to see in every direction.  There
is a pulsing, green glow coming from the rooms to the north and south.  You
can see movement in the rooms as someone or something reveals a shadow in the
green glow.

290.name: The Recovery Room
desc: "   A warm, pulsing green light envelopes the room like a thick cloud.  Your body
begins to feel extremely heavy and all you can think to do is rest on the floor
and take a nap.  The room looks like a giant sphere with honey comb like walls.
The green glow is coming from within the honey comb wells.  Looking closer you
notice that some of the gnomes are actually sleeping in the wells.  The wells
appear to be full of some sort of gel or water like substance that seems to be
regenerating the gnomes.  They all appear to be in a deep sleep.  The hollowed
out tree opens up to the south.

The green glow is coming from within the honey comb wells.  Looking closer you

out tree opens up to the north.

299.name: A Hollowed Out Tree
desc: "   A wooden ladder has been carved into the wall and ascends into the hollowed
out tree above.  There are two thin copper wires running along the west side of
the ladder.  They seem to vibrate with the slightest touch and are glowing with
a dull, pulsing white light.  The entrance to the palace lies to the north.

300.name: A Hallway to the Throne Room
desc: "   A pebble and grass hallway continues to the north.  A hollowed out tree lies
to the south.  The palace appears to be some sort of giant plant.  The sides of
the hall bloom with the beautiful flowers from the vine fields.  Pulsing and
squirming, the wall seems to have a mind of its own.  The movement is almost
hypnotic, drawing you into smell the beautiful blooms.

301.name: A Hallway to the Throne Room
desc: "   A pebble and grass hallway continues to the north and south.  The palace
throne room lies directly to the north.  You can see the palace greenhouse
to the west and the palace greeting room to the east.  A hollowed out tree
lies at the end of the hallway to the far south.  The palace appears to be
come sort of giant plant.  The sun shines down from the top of the bulb
above your head.  The corners of the hallway bloom with the beautiful flowers
from the vine fields.  Pulsing and squirming, the wall seems to have a mind
of its own.  The movement is almost hypnotic, drawing you into smell the
beautiful blooms.

302.name: The Royal Greenhouse
desc: "   The smell of the greenhouse is almost intoxication.  The gnomes are growing
rare spices and plants from all around world in here.  You have never seen
such an amazing collection of botanical delights.  The greenhouse itself is
enclosed in glass.  You can see another vine field growing to the northwest
through the glass panels.  It looks like one of the panels might be able to
be opened.

303.name: The Royal Greeting Room
desc: "   A giant wooden table rests in the middle of the room.  Several large bulbs
have sprouted from the ground forming chairs all around the table.  Paintings
of gnomish history decorate the walls above the tables.  It is obvious this
room has seen a lot of debate and meetings in its time.

304.name: The Throne Room
desc: "   A pebble and grass path leads up a small hill to three large bulbs that have
sprouted from the ground.  The bulbs are in full bloom and look quite lovely.
The throne in the middle is a pitch-black color with misty white petals all
around the sides.  The bulb to the east of the pitch-black bloom is a bright
pink color with shiny yellow petals all around the sides.  The bulb to the west
of the pitch-black bloom is a pumpkin orange color with dull brown petals all
around the sides.  The pebble and grass path continues along a large hallway to
the south.

305.name: The Crystal Room
desc: "   The walls of this room are laced with moss and crystal covered rocks.  The
crystals are vibrantly colored and pulse with a dull glow in their according
hues.  Thin copper wires run all across the floor of the room and seem to be
connected to the bottom of the rock walls.  This must be where the gnomes are
getting the energy to run their machines.  A steel ladder leads down to the
machine room.

306.name: A Path Along the Vines
desc: "   A wooden walkway extends to the northwest, ending at a large tree in the
distance.  There are bright green vines growing to the east.  The vines are growing
along some thin wires that form a sort of wall before you.  The wires run from the
edge of the walkway to a metal watering device above your head.  The watering
system sprays out mists of water every few minutes, refreshing the flowers
and your face.  Some pitch-black flowers with misty-white petals grow all along
the vines.  Maybe the gnomes will not notice if you take one!  It appears that
you can climb up the vines from here to reach another walkway.

307.name: The Palace's Private Garden
desc: "   The wooden walkway continues to the southeast and northwest.  There are bright
green vines growing to the east.  The vines are growing along some thin wires
that form a sort of wall before you.  The wires run from the walkway to a metal
watering device above your head to the east.  The watering system sprays out
mists of water every few minutes, refreshing the flowers and your face.  Some
pitch-black flowers with misty-white petals grow all along the vines.  Maybe
the gnomes will not notice if you take one!  It appears that you can climb
up the vines from here to reach another walkway.

308.name: The Palace's Private Garden
desc: "   The wooden walkway continues to the southeast and northwest.  There are bright
green vines growing to the east.  The vines are growing along some thin wires

desc: "   A wooden walkway extends to the southeast, ending at a large tree in the
distance.  There are bright green vines growing to the east.  The vines are growing
along some thin wires that form a sort of wall before you.  The wires run from the
edge of the walkway to a metal watering device above your head.  The watering
system sprays out mists of water every few minutes, refreshing the flowers
and your face.  Some bright white flowers with pale blue petals grow all along
the vines.  Maybe the gnomes will not notice if you take one!  It appears that
you can climb up and down the vines from here to reach another walkway.

500.name: A Well Worn Path
desc: "   The path although it has been well maintained.  It is still obvious
that it is rather old, just by looking at the trees that grow on either
side of it.  The path is big enough here to allow for the small carts that
some merchants use.
